left steer='left arrow'
right steer =' right arrow'
accelerate = 'place your hand'
throttle= ' up arrow'
brake = 'down arrow'
 

Steer Sensitivity = 0.7000
Steer Power = 5.000
Steer Dead Zone = 0.4000
Steer speed factor = 4.000
Brake Sensititvity = 1.000
Brake Power = 1.000
Throttle sensitivity = 5.000
Clutch sensitvity = 1 .000
